summary: Max Hastings, who himself worked on the landmark series The Great War (1964) 50 years before, argues the case that his and many other ancestors did not die in vain in The First World War.
cast: Max Hastings|Clive Harris|John Horne|Michael Howard|Margaret MacMillan|Annika Mombauer|John Rohl|Hew Strachan
title: The Necessary War
